detectors.description:
Cloud.invest(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3951d77737733174152532e8b0f27e2c4e9f0dc_Cloud.sol#171-190) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- employeeTokens = numTokens.mul(employeeShare).div(100) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3951d77737733174152532e8b0f27e2c4e9f0dc_Cloud.sol#178)
	- tokensReleased = tokensReleased.add(numTokens).add(employeeTokens.mul(4)) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3951d77737733174152532e8b0f27e2c4e9f0dc_Cloud.sol#187)
detectors.markdown:
[Cloud.invest(address,uint256)](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3951d77737733174152532e8b0f27e2c4e9f0dc_Cloud.sol#L171-L190) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [employeeTokens = numTokens.mul(employeeShare).div(100)](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3951d77737733174152532e8b0f27e2c4e9f0dc_Cloud.sol#L178)
	- [tokensReleased = tokensReleased.add(numTokens).add(employeeTokens.mul(4))](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c3951d77737733174152532e8b0f27e2c4e9f0dc_Cloud.sol#L187)

detectors.description:
